name: Project Alpha
introduction: A foundational exploration of the principles of quantum mechanics and its applications.

name: Project Beta
introduction: Delve deeper into cutting-edge machine learning strategies, focusing on neural networks and deep learning.

name: Project Gamma
introduction: An introduction to the field of robotics, emphasizing the integration of mechanics and electronics.

name: Project Delta
introduction: Explore the intersection of biology and informatics, learning how to analyze biological data and sequences.
